name: Deep Data
description:
This Hardcore infiltration Game makes you incarnate a spy send into a secret bunker, in order to steal vital information.

You only have one chance, one life. If you are spotted, you lose.  The game is structured in level with complexity and increasing difficulty. At the end of each level, you find yourself facing the main monitor that allows you to resend you hard-won data. But you only have one access code. Clearly, you will have the choice between transmitting the data, and ending your party, or try to continue to the next monitor, the risk of making you spot.

Pay attention! And Enjoy!!!
